name: Over My Dead Body (demo)
description:
Death is not the end when you're a subject of a cloning experiment gone wrong.

Since the bodies of your previous clones remain after death, you can use them to reach new heights (literally), create safe passages, or shield yourself from bullets. Think of it as a twisted game of Tetris, except the blocks are your own lifeless corpses.

Note: This project is a work in progress. Feel free to share your feedback if you want to help me make this game better.

Controls

Arrow keys — movement

Z — jump

X — eat a cyanide pill

T — skip the level

Credits

Art & coding: @FeatureKreep

Music: @ClementPanchout

Want to support me? Buy me a coffee ☕ or subscribe to my Patreon
